main event: A civilian observer reported seeing an unidentified aerial object in Centerville, Ohio on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light the same brightness as an aircraft, but did not behave like a normal aircraft.
The object was estimated to be 2-3 miles from the observer and was following behind another aircraft.
The sky was hazy and there was no moonlight at the time of the sighting.
No photographs were taken of the object.
result: Possible aircraft, not consistent with military craft
